title: League Ping (Without ethernet)
body:
So when i dont use my ethernet cable i get really high ping sometimes 600+ and sometimes ~120.
My internet is fine as everything else works fine and my other laptops work fine, and league worked fine before too.
i dont want to use the ethernet cable because i have to lie on the floor in another room and play league.

everything was working fine until i upgraded to windows 8.1 where league didnt work so when i factory reset my laptop back to windows 8 dx9.dx_39.dll (something like that) was missing, so i downloaded a package to make it work (official from microsoft) and my ping was high. so yeh im not sure what it is, im gonna run a malware and antivirus scan and see what comes up.

Hope you can help,
Thanks in Advance!
Lika Sunryze,

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried reinstalling your network driver?

>
> Hey there,
>

Sadly nothing improved :( got any other suggestions i could try?

sorry for the late reply, ill try reinstalling them then let you know what happens.
